Text:
TvTeam... How are you still around and relevant?  Why do you refuse to put any info, aspect ratio, comments or anything showing that you give a shit.  I see a robot hating his job when I think of you and the "scene" guys.  You need a reboot.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1673697/
Hey man, you're not the only one who is annoyed by this. Everytime my results come up, I avoid clicking TvTeam.

In fairness to TvTeam, his uploads are legit and are in good quality.

But, you guys do have a point. He/she should provide details about each upload.
